api_list.api_description: Retrieve a random Chuck Norris joke in JSON format.
Get details about a specific Pokémon by ID or name.

required_parameters.name: pokemon_id_or_name
required_parameters.description: ID or name of the Pokémon.

query: Can you tell me a random Chuck Norris joke and give me details about Pokémon Pikachu?

api_list.api_description: Retrieve a list of available categories for Chuck Norris jokes.
Get details about a specific Pokémon ability by ID or name.

required_parameters.name: ability_id_or_name
required_parameters.description: ID or name of the Pokémon ability.

query: What categories are available for Chuck Norris jokes? Also, can you provide me with information on the Pokémon ability 'Overgrow'?

api_list.api_description: Free text search for Chuck Norris jokes.
Get information about a specific berry flavor by ID or name.

required_parameters.name: flavor_id_or_name
required_parameters.description: ID or name of the berry flavor.

query: Can you search for Chuck Norris jokes containing the word 'karate' and tell me about the sweet berry flavor in Pokémon?
